com.guardtime.envelope.packaging

Class Envelope

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.guardtime.envelope.packaging.Envelope
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExtendedEnvelope, VerifiedEnvelope

    public class Envelope
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    Envelope that encompasses documents, annotations and structure elements that link the annotations to the documents and signatures that validate the content of the envelope.

    • Method Detail

      • getSignatureContents

        public List<SignatureContent> getSignatureContents()
        Returns:
        Sorted list of SignatureContent contained in this envelope.

      • getUnknownFiles

        public List<UnknownDocument> getUnknownFiles()
        Returns:
        List of all UnknownDocument that were not associated with any structure elements or signatures but were contained in the Envelope

      • close

        public void close()
           throws Exception
        Closes the envelope and all Documents and Annotations in the envelope. NB! This will close Documents and Annotations added during creation as well.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Throws:
        EnvelopeClosingException - when some resources fail to close. All resources are attempted to be closed and all exceptions encountered will be added to thrown exception and can be accessed by EnvelopeClosingException.getExceptions().
        Exception

      • add

        public void add(SignatureContent content,
                ParsingStore parsingStore)
         throws EnvelopeMergingException
        Adds a copy of SignatureContent to this Envelope.
        Parameters:
        content - the content to be added.
        parsingStore - instance of ParsingStore to be used for deep copying SignatureContent.
        Throws:
        EnvelopeMergingException - when the SignatureContent can not be added into the Envelope.

      • addAll

        public void addAll(Collection<SignatureContent> contents,
                   ParsingStore parsingStore)
            throws EnvelopeMergingException
        Adds copies of all SignatureContents to this Envelope.
        Parameters:
        contents - the content to be added.
        parsingStore - instance of ParsingStore to be used for deep copying SignatureContent.
        Throws:
        EnvelopeMergingException - when any SignatureContent can not be added into the Envelope.

      • getSignedDocuments

        public List<SignedDocument> getSignedDocuments()
        Returns:
        The list of all Documents that are signed.
